thread.title: Hear Fleet Foxes’ Robin Pecknold Cover Curtis Mayfield
thread.title_full: Hear Fleet Foxes’ Robin Pecknold Cover Curtis Mayfield

author: Chris DeVille
title: Hear Fleet Foxes’ Robin Pecknold Cover Curtis Mayfield
text:
Chris DeVille @chrisdeville | 5:00 pm Share < br />this article: 
We’ve yet to hear any official music from Fleet Foxes LP3 (the album maybe-officially known as Ylajali ), but frontman Robin Pecknold kept up his steady stream of social media interactions today by posting a Curtis Mayfield cover to Instagram. As Pitchfork points out, the song is “The Makings Of You” from 1970’s Curtis , which Pecknold cited in a since-deleted Instagram post as an inspiration for Fleet Foxes LP4 . You may recognize “The Makings Of You” from when it was sampled on Jay Z and Kanye West’s Watch The Throne bonus track “The Joy.” Hear Pecknold’s cover below. A video posted by Robin Noel Pecknold (@robinpecknold) on Jan 17, 2017 at 11:07am PST
